Name: resource-management
Title: Resource Management | AidIQ.com
Body:
Resource Management

Human Talent

Staff and Volunteers. ID cards. Roster. Mission Deployments.

Skills, Trainings, Certifications, Credentials.

Volunteer Management

Track Hours by Activity. Use Hours spent on Activities & Trainings to determine Active Volunteers. Certificates of Appreciation.

Reports by Age, Gender, Ethnicity and Location.

Member Management

Membership Fees

Facilities

Offices, Warehouses, Clinics, Fire Stations, etc

Inventory

Simple Inventory tracking or full-blown Logistics

Assets

Assets can be tracked through their lifecycle

Case Studies

  • HowCalm: House of Worship Communitywide Asset and Logistics Management. New York Disaster Interfaith Services
  • KrisenManagement. Rheinland-Pfalz State Government (Germany). Manage Volunteers for COVID-19 response.
  • RMS: Resource Management System. International Federation of Red Cross and Red Crescent Societies. Human Resources, Projects and Supplies.
  • SupportCumbria. Cumbria County Council (UK). Manage Volunteers for Emergencies, including COVID-19 response.
